dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT DISTINCT TO_DATE(ssur.remark_text,'yyyy-mm-dd') sorter, sh.shipment_xid, orel.order_release_xid, (SELECT oob.order_base_xid FROM ob_order_base oob WHERE oob.order_base_gid = orel.order_base_gid) order_base_xid, TO_CHAR(ROUND(sh.total_actual_cost,2),'999999990.00') shipment_cost, sh.t_actual_cost_currency_gid shipment_uom, (SELECT loc.location_name||decode(loc.city,NULL,NULL,', '||loc.city)||decode(loc.province_code,NULL,NULL,', '||loc.province_code)||decode(loc.postal_code,NULL,NULL,', '||loc.postal_code)||decode(loc.country_code3_gid,NULL,NULL,', '||loc.country_code3_gid) FROM location loc WHERE loc.location_gid = sh.dest_location_gid) deliver_to, sh.dest_location_gid, (SELECT loc.location_name||decode(loc.city,NULL,NULL,', '||loc.city)||decode(loc.province_code,NULL,NULL,', '||loc.province_code)||decode(loc.postal_code,NULL,NULL,', '||loc.postal_code)||decode(loc.country_code3_gid,NULL,NULL,', '||loc.country_code3_gid) FROM location loc WHERE loc.location_gid = sh.source_location_gid) source_loc, (SELECT pi.packaged_item_xid FROM packaged_item pi WHERE pi.packaged_item_gid = orl.packaged_item_gid) commodity_code, TO_CHAR(sh.end_time,'MM/DD/YYYY') delivery_date, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ssur.remark_text,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'MM/DD/YYYY') bl_date, glog_util.remove_domain(sip.involved_party_contact_gid) customer_id, TO_CHAR((ROUND(GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_FUEL_SURCHARGE_PKG.xxscou_get_fuel_surcharge_fcn ( sh.shipment_gid, sh.transport_mode_gid, orel.order_release_gid),2)),'999999990.00') fuel, DECODE(GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_FUEL_SURCHARGE_PKG.xxscou_get_fuel_surcharge_fcn ( sh.shipment_gid, sh.transport_mode_gid, orel.order_release_gid),NULL,NULL, (SELECT DISTINCT aord.cost_currency_gid FROM allocation_order_release_d aord WHERE aord.order_release_gid = orel.order_release_gid)) fuel_uom, TO_CHAR((ROUND(GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_FUEL_SURCHARGE_PKG.xxscou_get_freight_fcn ( sh.shipment_gid, sh.transport_mode_gid, orel.order_release_gid),2)),'999999990.00') freight, DECODE(GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_FUEL_SURCHARGE_PKG.xxscou_get_freight_fcn ( sh.shipment_gid, sh.transport_mode_gid, orel.order_release_gid),NULL,NULL, (SELECT DISTINCT aord.cost_currency_gid FROM allocation_order_release_d aord WHERE aord.order_release_gid = orel.order_release_gid)) freight_uom, TO_CHAR(ROUND(sh.loaded_distance,2),'999999990.00') mileage, sref.shipment_refnum_value loc_code FROM shipment sh INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d sstopd ON sh.shipment_gid = sstopd.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_remark ssur ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.TRAN ID DATE' INNER JOIN shipment_status ss ON sh.shipment_gid = ss.shipment_gid INNER JOIN status_type st ON ss.status_type_gid = st.status_type_gid AND st.status_type_xid = 'SAR_AS400' INNER JOIN status_value sv ON ss.status_value_gid = sv.status_value_gid AND sv.status_value_xid = 'SAR_AS400_YES' INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON sh.shipment_gid = sref.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sh.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN order_release orel ON ssul.order_release_gid = orel.order_release_gid INNER JOIN order_release_refnum orr ON orel.order_release_gid = orr.order_release_gid AND orr.order_release_refnum_value = 'Y' INNER JOIN order_release_refnum_qual orrq ON orr.order_release_refnum_qual_gid = orrq.order_release_refnum_qual_gid AND orrq.order_release_refnum_qual_xid = 'PLUS FUEL SURCHARGE' INNER JOIN order_release_line orl ON orel.order_release_gid = orl.order_release_gid INNER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip ON sh.shipment_gid = sip.shipment_gid AND sip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'CUSTOMER' WHERE (TRUNC(NVL(TO_DATE(NVL(REGEXP_SUBSTR(ssur.remark_text,'^[0-9]{4}-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]$'),SYSDATE),'yyyy-mm-dd'),SYSDATE)) >= NVL(TO_DATE(NVL(:P_START_DATE,'1900-01-01'),'yyyy-mm-dd'),TRUNC(NVL(TO_DATE(NVL(REGEXP_SUBSTR(ssur.remark_text,'^[0-9]{4}-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]$'),SYSDATE),'yyyy-mm-dd'),SYSDATE))) AND TRUNC(NVL(TO_DATE(NVL(REGEXP_SUBSTR(ssur.remark_text,'^[0-9]{4}-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]$'),SYSDATE),'yyyy-mm-dd'),SYSDATE)) <= NVL(TO_DATE(NVL(:P_END_DATE,'2999-01-01'),'yyyy-mm-dd'),TRUNC(NVL(TO_DATE(NVL(REGEXP_SUBSTR(ssur.remark_text,'^[0-9]{4}-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]$'),SYSDATE),'yyyy-mm-dd'),SYSDATE)))) AND (TRIM(:P_LOC_CODE) IS NULL OR (NOT TRIM(:P_LOC_CODE) IS NULL AND sref.shipment_refnum_value = TRIM(:P_LOC_CODE))) AND (TRIM(:P_SHIPMENT_ID) IS NULL OR (NOT TRIM(:P_SHIPMENT_ID) IS NULL AND sh.shipment_gid = TRIM(:P_SHIPMENT_ID))) AND (TRIM(:P_ORIGIN) IS NULL OR (NOT TRIM(:P_ORIGIN) IS NULL AND sh.source_location_gid = TRIM(:P_ORIGIN))) AND (TRIM(:P_DESTINATION) IS NULL OR (NOT TRIM(:P_DESTINATION) IS NULL AND sh.dest_location_gid = TRIM(:P_DESTINATION))) ORDER BY TO_DATE(ssur.remark_text,'yyyy-mm-dd') DESC
SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'FMDay, Month DD, yyyy ')) curr_date FROM DUAL
